  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602331.4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602331.4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Napoleons Rede in Fontainebleau</string>
            <string language="en">Napoleon speech in Fontainebleau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discours de Napoleon à Fontainebleau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso de Napoleon em Fontainebleau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Discorso di Napoleon a Fontainebleau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία Napoleon στο Φοντενμπλώ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discurso de Napoleon en Fontainebleau</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsaufträge für Gruppen- und Einzelarbeit zur  Rede Napoleons an die kaiserliche Garde im Schlosshof von Fontainebleau am 20. April 1814 nach dem fehlgeschlagenen Reldzug gengen Russland. Rede in deutscher Übersetzung.</string>
            <string language="en">Assignments for group and individual work on Napoleon speaking to the Imperial Guard in the courtyard of Fontainebleau on April 20, 1814 after failing in the combat against Russia. Speech translated into German.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Napoleon I.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Fontainebleau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Napoleon Ith</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Fontainebleau</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affectations pour le groupe et le travail 
individuel sur Napoleon parlant à la garde impériale dans la cour de
Fontainebleau 20 avril 1814 après avoir échoué dans le combat 
contre la Russie. Discours traduit en Allemand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atribuições para o grupo e o trabalho individual
em Napoleon que fala ao protetor imperial no pátio de Fontainebleau 
abril em 20, 1814 após a falha no combate de encontro a Rússia. 
Discurso traduzido no alemão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assegnazioni per il gruppo ed il lavoro specifico 
su Napoleon che parla alla protezione imperiale nel courtyard di 
Fontainebleau il 20 aprile 1814 dopo essere venuta a mancare nel 
combattimento contro la Russia. Discorso tradotto in tedesco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναθέσεις για την ομάδα και τη μεμονωμένη εργασία για 
Napoleon που μιλά στην αυτοκρατορική φρουρά στο προαύλιο του 
Φοντενμπλώ στις 20 Απριλίου ..1814 μετά από να αποτύχει στον 
αγώνα ενάντια στη Ρωσία. Ομιλία που μεταφράζεται στα 
γερμανικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asignaciones para el grupo y el trabajo individual
sobre Napoleon que habla al protector imperial en el patio de 
Fontainebleau 20 de abril de 1814 después de fallar en el combate 
contra Rusia. Discurso traducido a alemán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Napoleon Ith</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fontainebleau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Napoleon Ith</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fontainebleau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
